original_text: You waited at the place where the roads joined each other. You wanted to kill those that ran away from the enemy. That is why you waited there. You should not have done that. Some Israelites were still alive, but they were in trouble. You should not have taken them to the enemy. The day of the Lord You waited at the place where the roads joined each other. You wanted to kill those that ran away from the enemy. That is why you waited there. You should not have done that. Some Israelites were still alive, but they were in trouble. You should not have taken them to the enemy. The day of the Lord You waited at the place where the roads joined each other.
korean_text: 네거리에 서서 그 도망하는 자를 막지 않을 것이며 고난의 날에 그 남은 자를 원수에게 넘기지 않을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: where the roads joined each other
that ran away from the enemy
That is why you waited there
You should not have done that

sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 이스라엘 사람들은 아직 살아 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: You should not have taken them
where the roads joined each other
